mainText:
I'm just a kid who attends Rutgers University. I never knew Mr. Jobs personally, but I didn't have to, to understand how amazing he was. It's shocking, but I am actually crying because Mr. Jobs has died. There was so much more life for him to live. So much more to do, to make this world a better place. Steve Jobs you will never be forgotten!! 

R.I.P. Mr. Jobs, and long live Apple!
header: One of the most amazing humans to walk this earth!
author: Sagar
